description: Standard table definitions for Prediction Markets.

block_timestamp.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

user_address.description: The address of the user the record is for.

market_id.description: Identifier for the market the order is placed on.

order_id.description: Identifier for the particular limit order.

open_order_size_usd.description: The USD value of the open amount for the particular limit order.

closed_order_size_usd.description: The USD value of the open amount for the particular limit order.
